data.title: Reservations / Limiting Time we could be in the restaurant
data.text:
I always thought this place was good UNTILL I tried to make reservations for my fathers 85th birthday
I wanted to make reservations for 14 people for Dinner on a Friday -  the person I talked to told me that 
I could make the reservation but we would be limited to 1.5 hours we could be at the table . OK I understand 
this is a large dinner party and was going to cost me probably $700.00 + Tip so But it would probably take them
30 minutes to take our orders ! So only an hour to eat and converse ?- I figured the price of our tab would make 
up for any extra inconveniences they might encounter . You know I am not sure if Danny Grey is aware of this 
happening But it left a very Bad taste in my mouth after this. I used to go there 4-5 times a year 
But after this I will not go back and I will not recommend this place to anyone

data.title: WOW
data.text: This restaurant is fun and oh so friendly.  The food is excellent and plentiful.  You start with veggie plate, bread, salad, soup, then entrée and finally dessert!  What a pleasant surprise!  And the drinks were good.

data.title: "Great all-around place"
data.text: We finally dined here after deciding to try only new places (to us) in town. This could be fancy or casual. The food, service and drinks all were very good. I had the filet mignon and while it was a thick cut, the chef cooked it perfect to my medium - well liking. My husband had the salmon special and it was a decent-sized piece. While it might seem pricey to some, it did include a relish tray, soup, salad and a scoop of ice cream. We would definitely go back again.

data.title: Great meeting place
data.text: A group of us met Monday At 4pm fir a meeting! Lots of room, staff is accomodating and sangria was excellent. We ordered 5 appetizers and all were delicious!

data.title: Best Calamari Steak Ever!
data.text: Have gone here for years and it offers great lunches and full plate dinners, never leave hungry, in fact normally take part of dinner home because there is so much food! Wonderful chef and great service along with great choice of wines and a full bar off to the side.

data.title: Oyster Night!
data.text: I saw advertisements on Facebook about Oyster Night, so my boyfriend and I decided to try them. To be honest, we didn't expect it to be as nice as it was. When you think of "Grill" you think of a higher class burger joint. We were not complaining, though! Both of us loved our food and the service was great! I would definitely recommend trying all of their oysters on Wednesdays. Next time we go, we will definitely dress better! lol

data.title: Come Hungry!!!
data.text: This was our first time at Center Street. It was great. You get a lot for the price. I had the NY steak and prawns and hubby has Chilean sea bass....both were great!

data.title: Best food in Turlock
data.text: If your looking for a great steak  prime rib or seafood this is your place. The vibe of the restraunt rocks!!!!. The new owner knows how to run a place . Great bar just a great place to be. They also have early bird specials. I promise you you won't be dissapointed !!!!

data.title: Date night
data.text: Service was so so, was expecting more for the price of meal and atmosphere. Food was good. Had Filet Mignon with loaded mashed potatoes. Ordered it rare and I got med. rare. Dim lighting made it romantic enough.

data.title: Center Street Grill
data.text: My wife and I  came here for dinner. WE had never been here before and had absolutely no idea what to expect. Service was very good. Food was very good an plentiful. I would recommend this restaurant.

data.title: Always a nice dining experience
data.text: I had the most wonderful calamari steak during one of my dining experiences here. Wonderful service, good timing of bringing out your food between courses.  I personally think the dining area could use a facelift and be updated a bit, but all in all it has a nice atmosphere.

data.title: Will never let you down
data.text:
Center Street Grill is one of my top 5 restaurants in Turlock. I think I've eaten there more than anywhere else in Turlock because it just never fails. Food is always great and service outstanding. 

Center Street has a full bar and a great wine list. And since the bar is partitioned from the restaurant, it's not as loud as many restaurants with an integrated bar. I GREATLY appreciate that!

One note: Center Street recently changed ownership. Often that is a sign of impending doom, when you have a product that works, but new ownership insists on changing it. That, however, does not seem to be the case. I've been there a few times since the change and the great staff and menu were retained, and everyone was excited about the minor changes the new owners intend to employ. 

You just cannot go wrong at Center Street!  :-)

data.title: Good place for lunch
data.text: A locals hangout. Eat here with family because they really like it. I have always had great service and the food is OK. Not bad just not as much diversity as I would like. Everything has always been just the way I ordered it. The prime rib at night is a favorite. Bar is just OK. Not as well stocked as I like but it is not there to be a "bar scene" place. The restaurant and bar are essentially one room and it can get noisy when there is a crowd.

data.title: Another fabulous meal
data.text:
We enjoyed another fabulous meal at this fine dining establishment. Between the prime rib and the filet mignon no one was disappointment.  The beef was perfectly seasoned, prepared and present. The salads, soups, bread and anti- pasta play were spot on and enjoyed by all. The rocky road ice cream is devine and should not be missed. 

Our service was excellent and Danielle kept food care of our party. I still enjoy dining at one of my favorite places.

data.title: Plenty of food
data.text: The food is ok. The bar is in the same area as the dining room so too loud for my taste. The meal comes with soup and salad so you don't leave hungry.

data.title: Excellent Food and Service
data.text: We were seated immediately and brought a plate of vegetables with dip and excellent bread. Our order was taken as soon as we had decided. Menu is extensive and my Beef Stroganoff was excellent as was my wife's Calamari. Soup and salad were included and also excellent as was dessert. have been there several times and every time was wonderful. Our friends were very satisfied with their fish dinners.

data.title: GOOD FOOD
data.text: Happy Place and good drinks with lots of smiles.we eat their allot so go and have fun with all your buds and gals

data.title: Best Ribeye steak sandwich in town
data.text: Staff is great, ribeye steak sandwich and house salad was excellent, perfect spot for meeting clients Our Congressman was even eating in there!!

owner_response.author: Center_Street_Grill, Owner at Center Street Grill, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for the review Brandi!  We look forward to seeing your next time!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Center Street Grill
data.text: The food here is great. Their calamari steak is incredible. You get a full meal for dinner, soup/salad, entree, ice cream. I don't think I've ever had a bad meal here., and they are not over priced.

owner_response.author: Center_Street_Grill, Owner at Center Street Grill, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for the review! We appreciate it. See you soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: This is our family favorite
data.text: This is our family favorite place. We go here for all celebrations. We love it. The atmosphere is great and so is the service. You never leave unsatisfied, great portions as well.
